StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Clonal Evolution of Pre-Leukemic Hematopoietic Stem Cells in AML

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The original data from this study is described in Jan M, Snyder TM, Corces-Zimmerman MR, Weissman IL, Quake SR, and Majeti R. Clonal evolution of pre-leukemic hematopoietic stem cells precedes human acute myeloid leukemia. Science Translational Medicine (2012)
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: Use of the data must be related to Blood Disorders. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms). The data can be used for the etiology, prevention, treatment of blood disorders, including applications proposing analytical methods, software or other research tool development. Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution responded that the study is not sensitive without submitting a new Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-specific (Blood Disorders, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-BD-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Blood Disorders. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).
The data can be used for the etiology, prevention, treatment of blood disorders, including applications proposing analytical methods, software or other research tool development.
